about.summary: Tinycss is a complete yet simple CSS parser for Python.

name: tinycss
raw_recipe:
{% set name = "tinycss" %}
{% set version = "0.4" %}
{% set sha256 = "12306fb50e5e9e7eaeef84b802ed877488ba80e35c672867f548c0924a76716e" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  number: 0
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python

test:
  imports:
    - tinycss

about:
  home: http://tinycss.readthedocs.io/
  license: BSD 3-Clause
  summary: 'Tinycss is a complete yet simple CSS parser for Python.'
  license_family: BSD

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - johanneskoester
